channel.title: Remot desktop
channel.description: Hi community I was wondering something about Remot desktop on Whonix and how they works Do they work like Remina on ubuntu ? Basically I want to connect from Whonix to a windows remot desktop What should I do?

item.title: Remot desktop
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
https://www.whonix.org/wiki/About#Based_on_Debian applies.

For a secure implementation ,use encrypted/authenticated vnc or vnc over ssh.

(And try to avoid Windows-anything as per https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Pre_Install_Advice#Windows_Hosts.)

Note, the Tor network does not support UDP.

Read full topic
